This product is great -- it appears to be built to very tight tolerances (the lid has a mini o-ring for a very tight seal), which works great. Just a suggestion -- as consumers are getting more and more concerned about leached chemicals from plastics, and seem to believe that silicone is a better alternative, it is probably time to investigate how to replace the plastics in this product with silicone.

evidence: The down side- the lids do not have hinges. You have to hold the cup while you fill it so it will not tip over and spill your coffee grounds
review_title: They are better than prefilled k cups
review_text: They are better than prefilled k cups. The down side- the lids do not have hinges. When you are trying to fill them the lids overbalance the cup to one side. You have to hold the cup while you fill it so it will not tip over and spill your coffee grounds while you fill it.
